sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_9e31b2894fbf120056357ab28110c7c4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Keep Alive 1</name><run_as display_value="Scott Halverson">26c46f564f851a0056357ab28110c7ca</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2016-06-02 15:04:03</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[updateBizRule('89b072494fbf120056357ab28110c765');

function updateBizRule(id) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
	if (gr.get(id)) {
		gr.script = gr.script + '\n //updated' + gs.nowDateTime();
		gr.update();	
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-02 15:05:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9e31b2894fbf120056357ab28110c7c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Keep Alive 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Instance Keep Alive" source="x_9026_instance_ke">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Instance Keep Alive">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_9e31b2894fbf120056357ab28110c7c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-02 15:05:48</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Keep Alive</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-02 15:03:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>89b072494fbf120056357ab28110c765</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Keep Alive</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Instance Keep Alive" source="x_9026_instance_ke">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Instance Keep Alive">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_89b072494fbf120056357ab28110c765</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-02 15:03:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=89b072494fbf120056357ab28110c765"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_d7a1ba494fbf120056357ab28110c77b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Keep Alive 2</name><run_as display_value="Scott Halverson">26c46f564f851a0056357ab28110c7ca</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:15:00</run_period><run_start>2016-06-02 15:06:03</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[// Create a periodic scheduled job that runs the script block
// below.  Ensure you set the endpoint to your instance name
// and be sure the userid/password info you set for both
// the basic auth and query parameters is correct
// Set the interval to something less than 30 min...I set to 15min

var instanceName = gs.getProperty('instance_name');
var endPoint = "https://" + instanceName + ".service-now.com/login.do";

var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
restMessage.setBasicAuth("itil", "itil");
restMessage.setHttpMethod("post");
restMessage.setRequestHeader("Content-Type","application/xml");
restMessage.setRequestHeader("User-Agent","Mozilla/5.0");
restMessage.setEndpoint(endPoint);
restMessage.setQueryParameter("user_name","itil");
restMessage.setQueryParameter("user_password","itil");
restMessage.setQueryParameter("sys_action","sysverb_login");
restMessage.setQueryParameter("sysparm_login_url","navpage.do");
restMessage.setQueryParameter("language_select","en");
var response = restMessage.execute();

gs.info("Ran Activity Script with error code of: "+ response.getErrorCode(),'tbd');
//gs.info("response is: " + response.getBody(),'tbd');]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-02 15:10:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d7a1ba494fbf120056357ab28110c77b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Keep Alive 2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Instance Keep Alive" source="x_9026_instance_ke">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Instance Keep Alive">4bedae094fbf120056357ab28110c7ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_d7a1ba494fbf120056357ab28110c77b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>scott.halverson@maryville.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-02 15:10:13</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
